t: r/LewisMachineTool on Reddit: What’s the best rifle case $200 or under? Almost done with my LMT 16” build. Gonna pcs soon want it secured on the move without dropping a whole check for a rifle case
s: May 14, 2023 - Small bags fit up to 20” rifles. Large bags fit my 27” SVD. If you’re air traveling then a hard case makes sense. Otherwise save some coin. ... This is what I use. They're made in China and sold under a bunch of different brands, some for as cheap as $40~50 if you shop around.
